profile.name: Lakshmi Sravani Kondeti
profile.title: Full-Stack Developer & Data Science Graduate
profile.bio_short: Building scalable applications with React Native, FastAPI, and Spring Boot. Passionate about machine learning and creating meaningful solutions.
bio_long: Recently graduated with a Master's degree in Data Science & Analytics from Florida Atlantic University (May 2025, GPA: 3.63/4.0). I specialize in building robust, scalable applications using modern technologies like React Native, FastAPI, and Spring Boot.

With hands-on experience in both software development and machine learning, I've worked on projects ranging from mobile banking applications to fraud detection systems. I'm passionate about leveraging technology to solve real-world problems and creating intuitive user experiences.
Currently working as a React/React Native Developer at Worldwide Interactive Services, where I develop cross-platform banking solutions and analyze user behavior to improve application performance.

experience.description: Browser and App for a credit union bank
highlights: Developed and maintained cross-platform banking platform with React, React Native, and Expo
Integrated RESTful APIs for account management and transactions
Implemented Sentry for error tracking and monitoring
Created dashboards and visual reports to track KPIs
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver enhancements under tight deadlines

experience.description: Apache Fineract Banking fraud detection mechanism
highlights: Developed ML-based fraud detection system to flag suspicious transactions
Used Python, scikit-learn, pandas for data analysis and pattern detection
Integrated ML models via microservices architecture with Spring Boot
Enabled real-time fraud alerts using REST APIs
Supported multi-tenant deployment with configurable detection rules

projects.name: HealthTrack Daily
projects.description: Native iOS health tracking application for monitoring daily wellness metrics
highlights: Built native iOS app with SwiftUI framework to track steps, mood, and sleep patterns
Implemented MVVM architecture with ObservableObject for clean state management
Designed intuitive TabView navigation with Today, History, and Log Entry screens
Created custom emoji-based mood selector and interactive sliders for data input
Developed persistent data storage for historical health entries and trend visualization

projects.name: Mobile Banking App with AI
projects.description: Cross-platform mobile banking app with AI-powered features
highlights: Built RESTful APIs with ML-based transaction tagging
Embedded AI chatbot for real-time financial advisory
Implemented analytics dashboards with category-based visualizations
Designed responsive UI with NativeWind and charts

projects.name: Loan Management System
projects.description: Full-stack mobile-first loan management platform with comprehensive application processing
highlights: Engineered complete loan management system supporting Personal, Business, Auto, and Mortgage loans
Built secure authentication system with JWT tokens, bcrypt password hashing, and session management
Designed multi-step loan application form with tabbed navigation for details, personal info, income, and documents
Implemented RESTful API with FastAPI and PostgreSQL database using Prisma ORM for type-safe queries
Integrated automated E2E testing with Maestro for comprehensive UI testing coverage
Containerized application with Docker for consistent deployment across environments

projects.name: HealthcarePlus Management Platform
projects.description: Full-stack healthcare management solution for patient appointments and health records
highlights: Developed cross-platform healthcare app with Expo and React Native for iOS, Android, and web
Built RESTful API with ASP.NET Core for managing health conditions, appointments, and patient records
Implemented secure user authentication with profile management and role-based access control
Designed custom theming system with reusable UI components for consistent user experience
Deployed multi-container architecture using Docker Compose for frontend, backend, and PostgreSQL services
Created comprehensive appointment booking system with health record submission capabilities

projects.name: PCUBE Project Portfolio Management
projects.description: Full-stack project portfolio management software with real-time sync
highlights: Designed microservices architecture with Docker Compose and Nginx
Implemented JWT-based RBAC authentication
Built modules for timesheets, vendors, and analytics
Enabled real-time project tracking with custom APIs

projects.name: Merchant Sales Improvement Tools
highlights: Implemented real-time slot booking and appointment management
Integrated Stripe payments and push notifications
Added multi-language support and coupon logic
Designed responsive UI for seamless cross-device experience

projects.name: Pneumonia Detection Using Deep Learning
highlights: Used VGG16 model for pneumonia classification from X-ray images
Applied data preprocessing and augmentation techniques
Improved accuracy through hyperparameter tuning
Evaluated performance using comprehensive metrics

education.degree: Master's in Data Science and Analytics
